Articles.Content:
My version of the reusable soviet Buran / Energia spaceplane system.

The spaceplane is not 100% replica, but very nice for "everyday use" in carer mode)

Most original in this project, was the first stage reusable system (more on: [http://buran.ru/images/jpg/gub3-44.jpg](http://buran.ru/images/jpg/gub3-44.jpg))

the "Energia" Rocket can take ca. 77t to the orbit (spaceplane "Buran" with the "big orange tank")

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/80Ssf)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T14:04:40Z" title="07/15/2015 02:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Bulbashenko**
  
problem witch insert pictures, can embed album from Imgur

> 
> My version of the reusable soviet Buran / Energia spaceplane system.
> The spaceplane is not 100% replica, but very nice for "everyday use" in carer mode)
> 
> Most original in this project, was the first stage reusable system (more on: [http://buran.ru/images/jpg/gub3-44.jpg](http://buran.ru/images/jpg/gub3-44.jpg))
> 
> 292 parts 
> 
> 824 t on start 
> 
> the "Energia" Rocket can take ca. 77t to the orbit (spaceplane "Buran" with the "big orange tank")
> 
> sorry problem witch insert pictures, can embed album from Imgur
> 
> Link for pictures: [http://imgur.com/a/80Ssf#0http://imgur.com/a/80Ssf#0](http://imgur.com/a/80Ssf#0http://imgur.com/a/80Ssf%230)
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> how i can embed album from Imgur?

I'm going to take you picture link for the example

[imgUR ]80Ssf[ /IMGUR] (remove the spaces in the brackets)

Essentially, what you do is take the last code in the album link and remove the #0 from the end of it, then stick it in between the brackets.

The fully reusable spacecraft-project Energia II (Buran-2) in KSP 0.90

![uragan3m.jpg](http://www.buran.ru./images/jpg/uragan3m.jpg)

![lFQtXdp.png](http://i.imgur.com/lFQtXdp.png)
